overview: GEMINI FIRE EXTENSION is a performance by John Orentlicher and a film by Andrew Lugg. The performance was filmed in the fall of 1971, in a classroom at Eastern Michigan University in Ypsilanti, Michigan--the finished 16mm film was released early in 1972. Lugg's film features a long film 'wipe', visualizing the 5-minute duration of the performance.
title: Gemini Fire Extension
